H0.text: The syndrome when hostages develop positive feelings for their captors is named after what city. Paris

H1.text: The syndrome when hostages develop positive feelings for their captors is named after what city. Berlin

H2.text: The syndrome when hostages develop positive feelings for their captors is named after what city. Rome

H3.text: The syndrome when hostages develop positive feelings for their captors is named after what city. STHLM

A4.text: Stockholm syndrome is named after an attempted bank robbery in 1973, in Stockholm, Sweden
